context: I was inconsiderate of your personal space and time
letters:
Dear [Husband's Name],

I hope this note finds you well. I want to take a moment to sincerely apologize for my recent behavior. I realize that I have been inconsiderate of your personal space and time, and I genuinely regret any stress or discomfort that I may have caused you.

I understand how important it is for each of us to have our own space and the time we need to recharge. In my eagerness to connect and share experiences, I failed to recognize your need for personal time, and for that, I am truly sorry. I appreciate the patience you've shown and want you to know that your feelings are valid and important to me.

Moving forward, I will be more mindful of your boundaries and communicate better to ensure that we both feel supported in our individual needs. Thank you for your understanding, and I appreciate your willingness to work through this together.

With love and respect,

[Your Name]
